original_text: His body was bright like a jewel. His face shone like lightning. His eyes were like flames of fire. His arms and his feet shone like bright bronze. When he spoke, his voice was very loud, like the sound of many people's voices.
korean_text: 또 그의 몸은 황옥 같고 그의 얼굴은 번갯빛 같고 그의 눈은 횃불 같고 그의 팔과 발은 빛난 놋과 같고 그의 말소리는 무리의 소리와 같더라

sentences.original_text: His body was bright like a jewel.
His eyes were like flames of fire.
His arms and his feet shone like bright bronze.
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 팔과 발은 빛나는 놋과 같이 빛났습니다.

sentences.original_text: When he spoke, his voice was very loud.
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 말할 때, 그의 목소리는 매우 컸습니다.

sentences.original_text: like the sound of many people's voices.
